a.span: Free and Reduced Lunch Application Information

div.p: We are currently accepting enrollment for our Pre K 3, Pre K 4, and Kindergarten classes. Enrollment forms are located in the Quicklinks. Please submit all required documents with enrollment forms (Copy of Birth Certificate, Copy of Social Security Card, Copy of Immunization Records, Proof of Residence in Keystone District). Incomplete enrollment forms will not be accepted. You may email your forms to . . .
Free and Reduced Lunch Applications can be obtained in the main office. If you have questions about the form, you may contact the main office at 918-363-8298.

a.aria-label: Read more about Free and Reduced Application Information

div.p:
Welcome to the Keystone Public Schools web site. The site will continue to evolve and keep you up to date on important school activities and information. While the site won't be a daily newspaper by any means, it is certainly our goal to keep the content updated.
MOBILE ACCESS We are excited to tell you that the new web site is adaptable for viewing on all mobile devices and that you have a choice on your viewing preference.
The next time you view our website on a tablet or smartphone, our web site will automatically detect your mobile device, . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Welcome to www.keystonerangers.org

div.p: Keystone Public Schools is now participating in the School Reach automated phone call system. Announcements will be sent out to the primary phone number that we have listed for your child. If you have not received an automated phone call this school year, please contact the main office at 918-363-8298 and make sure you are listed as the primary contact and your phone number on record is current. We also need a current email . . .

div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 17:55 pm CDT

td.span: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. Southeast wind 10 to 15 mph.
A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 79. South wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 62. South wind 5 to 10 mph.
